Comment.summary: The Comment interface represents textual notations within markup; although it is generally not visually shown, such comments are available to be read in the source view.

remarks.para: Comments are represented in HTML and XML as content between <!-- and -->. In XML, like inside SVG or MathML markup, the character sequence -- cannot be used within a comment.

CommentComment.summary:
The Comment() constructor returns a newly created
object with the optional string given in
parameter as its textual content.

remarks.para:
-The DOM interfaces index
- is an outdated alternative to this constructor.

CommentComment.returns: A new containing content, or the empty string if no parameter was given.
